name: playwright_js_web_api_visual_pom
description: This project uses Playwright and the Page Object Model (POM) framework to perform end-to-end testing on web applications. It includes web testing, API testing and visual testing.

scripts.test: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test
scripts.single: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test login_state.spec.js
scripts.test:TC01: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test TC_01_Verify_Place_Order.spec --project=Chrome
scripts.test:single: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test TC_02_Verify_All_Products.spec.js --project=Chrome
scripts.test:parallel: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep @e2e --project=Chrome
scripts.test:serial: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep @e2e --workers=1 --project=Chrome
scripts.test:e2e: npx cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --grep @e2e --workers=3 --project=Chrome
